sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.GlideEntitlementAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GlideEntitlementAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GlideEntitlementAjax = Class.create();

GlideEntitlementAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    hasCapacityTypeEntitlements: function() {
        var canRouteToEMS = new SubscriptionEntitlementsService().canRouteToEMS();
        var appId = this.getParameter("app_id");
        var appEntTable;
        var appIdField;
        var entTypeField;
        if (!canRouteToEMS) {
            appEntTable = "license_has_app";
            appIdField = "app.app_id";
            entTypeField = "license.license_type";
        } else {
            appEntTable = "subscription_has_app";
            appIdField = "application.app_id";
            entTypeField = "subscription.subscription_type";
        }

        var appEntGR = new GlideRecord(appEntTable);
        appEntGR.addQuery(appIdField, appId);
        appEntGR.addQuery(entTypeField, "1"); // capacity type of license : 1
        appEntGR.query();
        var responseObj = {
            "hasCapacityTypeEntitlement": appEntGR.hasNext()
        };
        return JSON.stringify(responseObj);
    },

    type: "GlideEntitlementAjax"
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-20 10:45:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6545e134fc8a7110f877c92e32e24768</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GlideEntitlementAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6545e134fc8a7110f877c92e32e24768</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-20 10:45:11</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
